title: Data Engineering: Building Scalable Data Pipelines with Python and Apache Airflow

author: Laurindo C.Benjamim

title: Risk Classification with k-Nearest Neighbors
description: This project implements a k-Nearest Neighbors (kNN) classifier to predict customer risk levels ('good risk' vs. 'bad loss') using the classify_risk_dataset.
author: Laurindo C.Benjamim
